survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Kitchen Appliances Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and adoption trends for smart kitchen appliances to help manufacturers tailor their product offerings.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a checkbox format to allow multiple selections. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is included for accuracy.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Ensure the 'None of the above' option deselects other choices if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the smart kitchen appliances you currently own?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not own any)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. Include a 'Not applicable' option for respondents without smart appliances.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Skip logic: Show only if Q1 has at least one non-'None' selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the smart kitchen appliances you currently own?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not own any)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for purchasing smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for purchasing smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase additional smart kitchen appliances in the next 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. Include a neutral option for undecided respondents.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase additional smart kitchen appliances in the next 12 months?

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting a smart kitchen appliance? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Compatibility with other smart home devices
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with a limit of 3 selections. Randomize the order of options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a maximum of 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting a smart kitchen appliance? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Compatibility with other smart home devices

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for a smart kitchen appliance compared to a traditional one?
answer_options: I would not pay extra for smart features
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. Ensure the price ranges are realistic and easy to understand.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for a smart kitchen appliance compared to a traditional one?
answer_options: I would not pay extra for smart features

questions.question_text: What would encourage you to purchase a smart kitchen appliance in the future? (Open-ended response)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q4 selects 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'
